Package app.coronawarn.server.common.persistence.service.common

Class KeySharingPoliciesChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.coronawarn.server.common.persistence.service.common.KeySharingPoliciesChecker
  • @Component
public class KeySharingPoliciesChecker
extends Object
    Responsible for verifying that all policies enforced by DPP regulations (or stakeholders) are met prior to sharing diagnosis keys with other external systems. Examples of such rules:

  • ExpirationPolicy

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static long ONE_HOUR_INTERVAL_SECONDS
      The submission timestamp is counted in 1 hour intervals since epoch.
      static long TEN_MINUTES_INTERVAL_SECONDS
      The rolling start interval number is counted in 10 minute intervals since epoch.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      KeySharingPoliciesChecker()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean canShareKeyAtTime​(DiagnosisKey key, ExpirationPolicy policy, LocalDateTime timeToShare)
      Returns true if the given diagnosis key can be shared at the given time taking into account the expiration policy.
      LocalDateTime getEarliestTimeForSharingKey​(DiagnosisKey diagnosisKey, ExpirationPolicy policy)
      Calculates the earliest point in time at which the specified DiagnosisKey can be shared with external systems, while respecting the expiry policy and the submission timestamp.

        public LocalDateTime getEarliestTimeForSharingKey​(DiagnosisKey diagnosisKey,

        Calculates the earliest point in time at which the specified DiagnosisKey can be shared with external systems, while respecting the expiry policy and the submission timestamp.
